Author: kirin-xiv
Name: Resonance
Description:
Universal cross-client mod synchronization protocol for FFXIV. Enables TeraSync, Neko Net, Anatoli Test, and other Mare forks to sync with each other through decentralized AT Protocol.

Commands:
• /resonance - Opens main Resonance window
• /resonance-config - Opens configuration window

Features:
• Cross-client synchronization between different Mare forks
• Decentralized AT Protocol networking (Bluesky)
• Universal character data format
• Glamourer, Penumbra, Moodles, SimpleHeels support
• Customize+ and other plugin compatibility
• No changes to existing sync functionality
